subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Heart
lead_paragraph: A heart condition nearly killed Iowa State Coach Fred Hoiberg seven years ago and prematurely ended his N.B.A playing career. Another possible health scare is never too far from his thoughts.
snippet: A heart condition nearly killed Iowa State Coach Fred Hoiberg seven years ago and prematurely ended his N.B.A playing career. Another possible health scare is never too far from his thoughts.
